meaningMnemonic: This word consists of kanji with hiragana attached. Because the hiragana ends with an う sound, you know this word is a verb. The kanji itself means <kanji>drink</kanji> so the vocab verb version is <vocabulary>to drink</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: The reading is the same as the one you learned with the kanji. Go have a drink in the great Allicrab's name!
